channel.title: Daily Express :: World Feed

item.title: Hidden inscriptions found inside Great Pyramid rewrite the history of who REALLY built it
item.description: In a groundbreaking revelation, archaeologists have unearthed inscriptions within Egypt's Great Pyramid, challenging age-old beliefs about its builders.
item.author: Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Archaeology, Egypt, Great Pyramid, Zahi Hawass, Ancient Egyptian workers, Archaeological discovery

media:content.media:description: An elevated view of the Pyramid of Khafre, Giza, Cairo, Egypt.

media:thumbnail.media:description: An elevated view of the Pyramid of Khafre, Giza, Cairo, Egypt.

item.title: I live in an underground bunker with no windows but here's why its worth it
item.description: Caitlin Johnson, 44, saw a 'golden opportunity' to live in a friend's underground shelter in their backyard in California after moving from New York
item.author: Lauren Peacock,Michael D. Carroll
item.media:keywords: Cost of living, World War 3, Underground bunker living, Affordable housing alternative, California rental market, Unconventional lifestyle

media:content.media:description: Caitlin with coffee in front of the bunker

media:thumbnail.media:description: Caitlin with coffee in front of the bunker

item.title: Heatwave fires LIVE: Tourist hotspots including Crete and Turkey suffer apocalyptic blazes
item.description: Vast swathes of land in Turkey and Crete have been engulfed by an inferno sweeping across popular tourist hotspots
item.author: William Morgan
item.media:keywords: Emergency News, Mediterranean, Turkey holidays, Turkey, Greece, Greece holidays, Turkey wildfires, Crete fires, Mediterranean tourist areas, evacuation orders

item.title: Mysterious object from 'another star system' is 'waking up' while heading towards Earth
